name: Spygame (enzodaiki)
description:
The game's audio might be very loud, so turn your volume down a little before playing it.

A small game made for the tenth GBJAM

Controls D-padArrow keysMoveB buttonZ keyShootA buttonX keyStabStartEnter keyPause and skip dialogSelectSpace barEnter/Leave vent

Music made by Angelo Stanca:

https://soundcloud.com/angelostanca
